sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO ,FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM ,LOC ,OWNER ,TO_CHAR(BLD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BLD_DT ,TO_CHAR(CNST_BEGIN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNST_BEGIN_DT ,TO_CHAR(CNST_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNST_END_DT ,CNSTRTR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(CNSTRCT_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS CNSTRCT_AMT ,FCLTS_CN ,FCLTS_STRCT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(ARCH_FCLTS_CNT,'999,999,999,990')) AS ARCH_FCLTS_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(CVL_ENG_FCLTS_CNT,'999,999,999,990')) AS CVL_ENG_FCLTS_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(MECH_FCLTS_CNT,'999,999,999,990')) AS MECH_FCLTS_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(ELCTY_FCLTS_CNT,'999,999,999,990')) AS ELCTY_FCLTS_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(INFO_COMM_FCLTS_CNT,'999,999,999,990')) AS INFO_COMM_FCLTS_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(ETC_FCLTS_CNT,'999,999,999,990')) AS ETC_FCLTS_CNT ,RM ,REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE 1 = 1
AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO LIKE #sFcltsMngGroupNo# || '%'
AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM LIKE '%' || #sFcltsMngGroupNm# || '%'
ORDER BY FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO ) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(COUNT(*),'999,999,999,990')) AS DATA_COUNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(ARCH_FCLTS_CNT),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_ARCH_FCLTS_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(CVL_ENG_FCLTS_CNT),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_CVL_ENG_FCLTS_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(MECH_FCLTS_CNT),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_MECH_FCLTS_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(ELCTY_FCLTS_CNT),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_ELCTY_FCLTS_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(INFO_COMM_FCLTS_CNT),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_INFO_COMM_FCLTS_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(ETC_FCLTS_CNT),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_ETC_FCLTS_CNT FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE 1=1
AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO LIKE #sFcltsMngGroupNo# || '%'
AND FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM LIKE '%' || #sFcltsMngGroupNm# || '%'

SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO ,FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM ,LOC ,OWNER ,TO_CHAR(BLD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BLD_DT ,TO_CHAR(CNST_BEGIN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNST_BEGIN_DT ,TO_CHAR(CNST_END_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNST_END_DT ,CNSTRTR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(CNSTRCT_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS CNSTRCT_AMT ,FCLTS_CN ,FCLTS_STRCT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(ARCH_FCLTS_CNT,'999,999,999,990')) AS ARCH_FCLTS_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(CVL_ENG_FCLTS_CNT,'999,999,999,990')) AS CVL_ENG_FCLTS_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(MECH_FCLTS_CNT,'999,999,999,990')) AS MECH_FCLTS_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(ELCTY_FCLTS_CNT,'999,999,999,990')) AS ELCTY_FCLTS_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(INFO_COMM_FCLTS_CNT,'999,999,999,990')) AS INFO_COMM_FCLTS_CNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(ETC_FCLTS_CNT,'999,999,999,990')) AS ETC_FCLTS_CNT ,RM ,REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(REGIST_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(UPDT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT FROM FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F SET FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo# ,FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM = #fcltsMngGroupNm# ,LOC = #loc# ,OWNER = #owner# ,BLD_DT = TO_DATE(#bldDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,CNST_BEGIN_DT = TO_DATE(#cnstBeginDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,CNST_END_DT = TO_DATE(#cnstEndDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,CNSTRTR = #cnstrtr# ,CNSTRCT_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#cnstrctAmt#,',','')),0) ,FCLTS_CN = #fcltsCn# ,FCLTS_STRCT = #fcltsStrct# ,ARCH_FCLTS_CNT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#archFcltsCnt#,',','')),0) ,CVL_ENG_FCLTS_CNT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#cvlEngFcltsCnt#,',','')),0) ,MECH_FCLTS_CNT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mechFcltsCnt#,',','')),0) ,ELCTY_FCLTS_CNT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#elctyFcltsCnt#,',','')),0) ,INFO_COMM_FCLTS_CNT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#infoCommFcltsCnt#,',','')),0) ,ETC_FCLTS_CNT= NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#etcFcltsCnt#,',','')),0) ,RM = #rm# ,UPD_USR = #regUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #fcltsMngGroupNo#
